titleStmt.title: A dialogue between a popish priest, and an English Protestant. Wherein the principal points and arguments of both religions are truly proposed, and fully examined. / By Matthew Poole, author of Synopsis Criticorum.
titleStmt.author: Poole, Matthew, 1624-1679.

editionStmt.edition: The last edition corrected and amended.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for Tho. Passinger, and are to be sold by John Williamson ...,

notesStmt.note: Misidentified on UMI microfilm as Wing P2830.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
